channel.title: Silomia - Touch the light through the path of words
channel.description: Website sharing various ideas about the meaning of life, insights into personal and professional achievement, inspiring and fun things to do.

image.title: Silomia - Touch the light through the path of words

item.title: Home
item.description: Home page of this webpage.

item.title: Rudyard Kipling: “If-” you'll be a Man, my son!
item.description: Full poem in English: If you can keep your head when all about you Are losing theirs and blaming it on you… you'll be a Man, my son!

item.title: How to change your life? Solutions to succeed, evolve, reform
item.description: I have put together 10 tips on how to find the will to successfully achieve one's ambitions and overcome obstacles in one's personal and professional life.

item.title: Free Yourself from Evil and Change the World: Our Commitment
item.description: The world is ruled by cynicism, but some people reject this legacy. Is there another non-ideological way to get out of the trap and find our Supreme Humanity?

item.title: Video: Guided session of Universal Meditation and Relaxation
item.description: Practise 30 minutes of relaxation or mindfulness meditation. Video suitable for all ages and physical conditions.

item.title: Beware of crowd manipulation methods!
item.description: A briefing on strategies and techniques for manipulating public and social opinion. As you are warned, you will know how to protect yourself from it.

item.title: Gourmet Treats: exquisite and tasty recipes
item.description: Exquisite recipes of pastries (madeleines, financiers, biscuits, mini cakes, muffins) and other delicacies (croissants, brioche, traditional cakes, pancakes…).

item.title: Madeleines: an exquisite mini-cake recipe
item.description: A great personal recipe. But are they still Madeleines? Rediscover them. They are plump, fondant, airy, excellent and easy to flavour.

item.title: Almond Financiers: an exquisite mini-cake recipe
item.description: Recette personnelle parfaite. Les financiers sont savoureux, fondants et faciles à aromatiser : noisette, amande, vanille, fruits rouges, chocolat, confit, gelée

item.title: Butter Biscuits: an exquisite mini-cake recipe
item.description: Best little biscuits in the world. The secret is in the quality of the ingredients and an exceptional butter that will bring all its flavours to the biscuits.

item.title: Mini Cakes: an exquisite recipe
item.description: Delicious British cake for the real connoisseur. With some tips: only dried fruits (apricot, fig, raisins flambéed with rum) and orange syrup.

item.title: Muffins: an exquisite mini-cake recipe
item.description: The best Muffin in the world! A great personal recipe to guarantee a soft, airy and moist crumb with lots of taste and aromas.

item.title: Bricks: an exquisite mini-cake recipe
item.description: speciality of Saint-Quentin. A tasty little cake, very soft and fondant, always associated with a flavour: cream, jelly, fruit, aroma.

item.title: Croissants: an exquisite pastry recipe
item.description: REAL croissants! A rich and airy texture, a clear taste of fermented dough, butter and hazelnut, a crispy base and a generous consistency.

item.title: Brioche: an exquisite pastry recipe
item.description: Brioche rich in flavour, with a distinct taste of butter and bakery, a tight and supple texture, and a soft crumb. Spread with jam, a pure delicacy!

item.title: Tère Couque (Tender Cake): an exquisite cake recipe
item.description: CLocal cake with an exceptional melt-in-the-mouth consistency, airy, soft and moist. No need to impregnate it with syrup, it remains moist with a lot of flavour.

item.title: Supreme pancakes: an exquisite and gourmet recipe
item.description: Does everyone know how to make pancakes? Actually, they don't. Here's the perfect recipe for pancakes that are exquisitely flavoured, soft and tear-free.

item.title: Caramel with Salted Butter: an exquisite recipe of delicacy
item.description: A new easy and unmistakable way of doing things. Perfect for filling pastries, macaroons, choux pastry, puff pastry, toast, ideal on pancakes.

item.title: Hazelnut Chocolate Spread: exquisite and gourmet recipe
item.description: Nutella easy to make with a much better taste than industry made. Everything goes in the blender: dry caramel, praline, hazelnut paste and Gianduja.

item.title: Amankay Apple Pie with Milk Jam: an exquisite cake recipe
item.description: Cake inspired by the flavours of Patagonia: tangy apples cooked in olive oil, cream with milk jam, caramelized almonds and exquisite shortbread dough.

item.title: Cherry Cream Streusel: an exquisite cake recipe
item.description: German speciality with its shortbread pastry like a crumble. Simple to make, rich in flavour, to pair with tangy fruits and a custard cream.

item.title: Viennese Apple Strudel: an exquisite cake recipe
item.description: A marvel. A great classic that I have tailored for its typical Strudel taste and its fine, slightly crunchy dough the same day, and soft the next day.

item.title: Kouglof or Gugelhupf: an exquisite cake recipe
item.description: Central European speciality. This basic Kouglof is delicious and easy to enrich. There are as many variations as there are regions and family traditions.

item.title: Stollen with dried fruits, spices and marzipan recipe
item.description: Traditional German cake served at Christmas time. Spicy bread with dried fruits and a marzipan heart. Delicious when served with a hot drink.

item.title: Rolled cake: an exquisite cake recipe
item.description: No Genoese but a very soft and fondant biscuit, a tender and enveloping cloud texture, of an incredible greediness, topped with cream or jam.

item.title: Strawberry Pie: an exquisite cake recipe
item.description: Classic recipe for strawberry pie on shortbread pastry, vanilla and amber rum custard cream. All tastes are balanced, a pure delicacy.

item.title: Rhubarb Pie: an exquisite cake recipe
item.description: Family recipe with Streusel shortbread pastry and custard. Very balanced and rich in taste. To vary with strawberries, apples or sour fruits.

item.title: Clafoutis: an exquisite cake recipe
item.description: The best clafoutis recipe. Tasty, very simple and quick to make, easy to vary. It pairs well with summer fruits, sweet, tart and juicy.

item.title: Universal Pie: an exquisite cake recipe
item.description: Two sweet and savoury pie bases that you CAN'T MISS with almost any pie fruit or mixed vegetables. Quick and easy to bake, without any technique.

item.title: Mirabelle or Quetsche plum: an exquisite cake recipe
item.description: Traditional family recipe for mirabelle plum or quetsche plum cake made with yeast-raised dough, cinnamon and cloves, typical of Germanic pastry making..

item.title: Poppy seed cake: an exquisite cake recipe
item.description: A cake with the typical flavour of Eastern European countries made with an original, very melt-in-the-mouth cake dough.

item.title: Rice pudding / Semolina pudding: delicacy recipes
item.description: Two creamy and unctuous desserts so easy and quick to make with many combinations of flavours.

item.title: Business Idea Canvas and Validate your Business Model
item.description: An easy tool to challenge a business idea or its innovative start-up with reality. To understand a company's business model in order to evolve.

item.title: 10 Secret Marketing Techniques for an Innovative Product
item.description: How to please customers? 10 strategies explained to entrepreneurs with simplicity and honesty. Know how to develop innovation in your product and service.

item.title: Blog of Jokes
item.description: A long collection of funny stories and jokes archived here for easy retrieval. For all tastes, all ages, neither sexist nor racist.

item.title: Internet: practical articles for webmasters
item.description: Here are several articles on website management, how to protect yourself from hackers and pirates, SEO, debugging, backup…

item.title: Secure and protect your website from hacker attacks
item.description: Very practical rules to stop most attacks against a website, very efficient filtering, and a list of easy and practical tips

item.title: How to backup and restore a website and its SQL database
item.description: You are never safe from a failure of your host or a hacking that would modify your website. Are you sure you have an effective backup?

item.title: Referencing a website: the true answers, the right method
item.description: Complete compilation of the necessary rules for SEO, indexing and positioning of your website with the major search engines. All practical information.

item.title: Scripts and debugging tips in PHP, MySQL, mail()
item.description: Code snippets that will help you identify problems and perhaps fix them.

item.title: Photographer's handy memento for beautiful images
item.description: Hints and tips to take beautiful photographs, settings, styles, common shooting scenarios, black and white, image editing…

item.title: Free downloads
item.description: Various documents in PDF format to download from this page about delicacies, law and the internet, HTML codes and various other things..

item.title: Collection of the various files offered in direct access
item.description: The files available in different pages of the site are grouped here.

item.title: List of all gourmet recipes in PDF and ePub
item.description: All the recipes on this site are also available in PDF format and an eBook in ePub format collects them as well, in French only.

item.title: Contact
item.description: To know how to contact me and the mandatory disclaimer on the legal notices and privacy rules attached to this website.

item.title: Site map (sitemap.xml)
item.description: For indexing robots and even humans. Complete list of all pages and files in PDF format.
